go_data.justification: IR8a acts as a coreceptor in combinations of up to three subunits in insect chemosensation.
IR8a is involved in insect chemosensation and is expressed in olfactory tissues.

go_data.term: detection of chemical stimulus involved in sensory perception of smell
go_data.justification: IR8a is necessary and sufficient for sensitivity towards organic acids and other odors.
IR8a is expressed in one to three OSNs underneath basiconic sensilla.
